document_data.name: Ambitious
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite polyhedron/97/The Living City: The Hand of Mercy and Marigold's Menagerie|12}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Ambitious''' was a [[porcupine]] who lived in a corner cage in [[Marigold's Menagerie]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The cage that Ambitious lived in featured an artificial dirt bank, with a hole to serve as his shelter. It also featured trays full of tall [[grass]]es that were frequently changed and put outside to keep them fresh. His body frequently bristled whenever visitors stopped by his cage, seemingly enjoying the attention.
document_data.History: Over the course of time he lived in Marigold's Menagerie, Ambitious was not once known to fire his quills at anyone.
